description: Wireless Earbuds,Bluetooth 5.3 earbuds with noise cancellation, 20-hour battery life, and IPX5 waterproof design.
Protective sleeve with soft padding, fits Macbook Air/Pro 13 inch, lightweight and water-resistant.
Fitness tracker, heart rate monitor, AMOLED screen, and 7-day battery.
Multi-compartment backpack, laptop sleeve included, perfect for carry-on and daily use.
1.5-meter braided fast charging cable compatible with all USB-C devices.
